entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Temiskaming Dam 12:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: SSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
